botan.cert.x509.certstor

Certificate Store

interface CertificateStore;
Certificate Store Interface

abstract const X509Certificate findCertRef(in X509DN subject_dn, ref const Vector!ubyte key_id);
Subject DN and (optionally) key identifier

class CertificateStoreInMemory: botan.cert.x509.certstor.CertificateStore;
In Memory Certificate Store

this(in string dir);
Attempt to parse all files in dir (including subdirectories) as certificates. Ignores errors.
